item.title: List of Donald Trump's Lies
item.description:
List of Donald Trump's Lies

image] Donald Trump has lied constantly throughout his campaign and his past. It is pretty much pointless to fact check Donald Trump at this point, out of the many statements Politifact has checked for Donald Trump, 91% are misleading and outright lies.

item.title: Super stylli: our pick of the finest (and most stylish) smart-pens.
item.description:
Super stylli: our pick of the finest (and most stylish) smart-pens.

Before touchpads, the stylus was at the cutting edge of data entry. And while designers and CAD operators remain devoted to the device, the advent of the touchscreen has sparked fresh interest in stylish stylii. Silicon Valley's big players are now rolling out a new era of smart stationery.

item.title: Mighty Audio's Portable Player
item.description:
Mighty Audio's Portable Player

There's now a tech solution for those who are tired of having their phone tag along on fitness activities but don't want to give up their perfectly tailored Spotify playlists. Allowing runners, bikers and others to detach from the physical (and mental) weight of smartphones is Mighty Audio, which launches on Kickstarter today.
